page.title: 20Housing in Wroughton
page.content: Along the A361 itself there are a number of turn of the century large houses together with rows of smaller terraced housing _ particularly in North Wroughton and Church Hill _ which have been modernised with new windows and frontages. The post war housing is split into mainly bungalows and semi_detached houses. The bungalows take up whole roads and are both detached and semi_detached. Among the houses are individual detached houses of varying sizes. The trend is that Wroughton will not extend much further but any new housing will go up in existing spaces within the confines of the present village boundaries.
